name: Incedo Inc.
description: Incebo integrated services and platforms that connect strategy and execution are built on the foundation of Design, AI, Data, and strong engineering capabilities blended with our deep domain expertise from digital natives.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Let's  join the movement
ShortDescription: Incedo is a digital transformation expert empowering companies to realize sustainable business impact from their digital investments.

Highlights.name: Empower your digital transformation
Highlights.description: Our work is built on the foundation of Design, Data and AI and strong engineering capabilities. We have deep domain expertise and work across multiple industries from telecom, financial services, product engineering to life sciences.

Highlights.name: Create delightful customer experiences
Highlights.description: Our SaaS platforms, IncedoPay for automating payment processes and our Incedo LighthouseTM platform for driving personalized experiences at scale, leverage data and insights to create memorable digital experiences.

Highlights.name: Rapid digital assessment
Highlights.description: Benchmarking of your digital journey against competitors and other best-in-class leaders with key issue identification. Portfolio of tactical and strategic recommendations that can enhance NPS, traffic and conversion KPIs. Execution roadmap based on impact, timelines and project complexity.

enhanced_description: Incedo Inc. is a digital transformation expert offering integrated services and SaaS platforms. Their solutions connect strategy and execution, built on a strong foundation of Design, AI, Data, and engineering capabilities, combined with deep domain expertise. Incedo empowers companies to realize sustainable business impact from their digital investments, with a specific focus on boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. They provide services in digital engineering and leverage expertise across multiple industries including telecom, financial services, product engineering, and life sciences. Key offerings include the IncedoPay SaaS platform for automating payment processes and the Incedo LighthouseTM SaaS platform for driving personalized experiences at scale, both leveraging data and insights. Incedo also offers rapid digital assessments for benchmarking digital journeys against competitors and providing tactical and strategic recommendations to enhance key performance indicators like NPS, traffic, and conversion.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Driving personalized customer experiences at scale
Optimizing hiring processes to reduce recruiting costs
competitive_advantages: Integrated services and platforms connecting strategy and execution
Foundation in Design, AI, Data, and strong engineering capabilities
Deep domain expertise from digital natives
Offers proprietary SaaS platforms (IncedoPay, Incedo LighthouseTM)
Provides rapid digital assessment with benchmarking and actionable recommendations
implementation_scenarios: Deployment of SaaS platforms for payment automation and personalized experiences
Consulting engagements for digital assessment and roadmap development
roi_benefits: Realize sustainable business impact from digital investments
